CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"4 Proposal"),ISPICKVAL(StageName,"5 Agreements Delivered"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"6 Negotiating"),ISPICKVAL(StageName,"7 Verbal Agreement")), MONTH(CloseDate)=MONTH(TODAY())+1), Bookings_Projection__c,0)
CustomField.label: Bookings Projection Next Month#2
